name: Sevonds
description:
Sevonds is a game where you complete a series of mini games in a seven second time window. Think WarioWare but made by an amateur in a week ;-)

There are two modes:

- Adventure:  Repeat all minigames in sequence, gain lives, and add skillpoints to modify the games.

- Arcade: Minigames at random, 4 lives, no skillpoints, faster difficulty curve.

My entry for Godot Wild Jam 32 with theme 'Seven' and wildcards:
D20: The skillpoint system in Adventure mode.
Dare to Fail (spoiler): If you lost a live in Adventure mode between repeats, you get two skillpoints instead of one.
